title: Bug 18934 - Scrollbars Enabled in ImageAnalyzer Example
description: The ImageAnalyzer example currently displays scrollbars when it shouldn't.
OB: Scrollbars are visible in the ImageAnalyzer example when it loads an image, causing an overflow beyond the viewport.
EB: Scrollbars should be disabled in the ImageAnalyzer example, ensuring that the image fits within the viewport without causing any overflow.
SR:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Load an image that exceeds the viewport size.
3. Observe the presence of scrollbars on the image viewer, allowing overflow.
4. Expected: The image should fit within the viewport without any visible scrollbars.
